text:
House [[Tharashk]] is governed by a council of three, one representative from each major clan. They meet in the [[Heart]] of [[Zarash'ak]], and each has a [[medusa]] bodyguard.

* [[Maagrim Torrn d'Tharashk]] (Clan [[Torrn]])
* [[Khandar'Aashta]] (Clan [['Aashta]])
* [[Daric d'Velderan]] (Clan [[Velderan]])
title: Tharashk triumvirate
tooltip: governing body of House Tharashk, with one representative from each major clan
